attributes.additional_details: The National Lottery is a National Scam, generating Roll Overs by picking numbers by Electric Magnets and then picking the numbers of it's choice to is chosen allocation and destination's, discriminating against certain class of people. This justified as more Roll Overs are generated around Christmas and Easter Times. They also pick dates to large jackpots which other religions cannot participate. Scratch cards are distributed in the same manner. Now with price increase it needs to be STOPPED.

rejection.details: How the Lottery is run is a matter for Camelot.
